FuncDef:
The unr tag command configures a route tag for an IP address pool in the IP address pool view.
The undo unr tag command deletes the configured route tag.
By default, no route tag is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the route tag for the IP address pool.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 4294967295AI.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Configuring tags and using routing policies allows various user routes to be advised to specific networks. This command is used to configure a route tag for a single ip address pool.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
The UNR route tag configured using this command applies only to BRAS access users and not hybrid access users.
The unr tag command can be run only in the local or remote address pool view.
